author: stsp
msg: On the 1.7.x-issue4087 branch, merge r1164929 from trunk.
This fixes the failing test (externals_test 38, "url-to-wc copy of externals").
It is rather surprising that only one test failed.
This should have been merged as part of r1243708. I overlooked r1164929
back then and trying to resolve conflicts manually I accidentally dropped
Because merging r1164929 to this branch now results in a conflict I put
the missing notification back and ran a --record-only merge of r1164929.
